initial_state: User is logged into the 4ga Boards web app and has access to a board with at least one card.
steps: Navigate to the board containing the card for which notifications are to be set.
Select the card by clicking on it to open the card details.
Locate the notifications option within the card details.
Select the type of notification desired (e.g., due date reminder, activity updates).
Configure the notification settings as needed (e.g., frequency, delivery method).
Save the notification settings for the card.
expected_state: Notifications are set for the card according to the user's configuration, and the user is informed of the notification settings saved.
